issue.title: Pelvis vs Foot Orientation after teleport

content.raw:
Besides, the FootstepDataRosMessage requires coordinates in the /world frame (https://github.com/ihmcrobotics/ihmc_ros_core/blob/develop/ihmc_msgs/msg/FootstepDataRosMessage.msg#L12)

Since the whole /tf tree has the wrong translation, we cannot send a step because we don't know where the robot really is, usually the robot ends up stepping on itself or trying to step somewhere out of reach.
